Who I Am & Why I Started Bookkeeping

My name is Rakib Uddin, and I'm the founder of Bookkeeper's Touch.

Numbers have always made sense to me‚Äîwhere others see stress and confusion, I see clarity and order. Over the years, I noticed that many small business owners were passionate about their work but struggled to stay on top of their finances.

Bookkeeping often felt overwhelming, distracting them from the very thing they loved most‚Äîrunning and growing their business.

Passionate About Numbers

That's why I started Bookkeeper's Touch.

My mission is simple: to take the weight of bookkeeping off your shoulders, so you can focus on what you do best. I believe every business, no matter its size, deserves accurate financial records, clear reporting, and someone they can trust with their numbers.

With a personal, detail-oriented approach, I work alongside small business owners as a partner‚Äînot just a bookkeeper. At Bookkeeper's Touch, you don't just get financial clarity‚Äîyou get peace of mind.

Your Trusted Partner

Personal, detail-oriented approach

I understand that every business is unique. That's why I take the time to understand your specific needs and challenges, providing personalized bookkeeping solutions that grow with your business.

When you work with Bookkeeper's Touch, you're not just getting a service‚Äîyou're gaining a partner who's invested in your success.

Personal Touch

Simple, Transparent Pricing

Choose the plan that fits your business needs. All plans include our commitment to accuracy and reliability.

Basic Plan
$99/month

Best for: Small businesses just starting with bookkeeping or looking for minimal monthly support.

  • Monthly bookkeeping & transaction recording up to 120
  • Bank reconciliation
  • Basic financial reports
  • QuickBooks/Xero/Wave setup if needed

This plan is perfect if you just need someone to keep your books organized and up-to-date without spending too much time on bookkeeping.

Most Popular
Standard Plan
$199/month

Best for: Growing businesses that need more detailed reporting and support.

  • Everything in the Basic Plan
  • Transaction recording up to 250
  • Monthly P&L, Balance Sheet & Cash Flow statements
  • Accounts payable/receivable tracking
  • Unlimited bookkeeping support via email/chat

This plan helps business owners see a clear picture of their finances every month so they can make informed decisions and focus on growth.

Premium Plan
$299/month

Best for: Businesses with complex finances or multiple accounts.

  • Everything in the Standard Plan
  • Transaction recording up to 350
  • Catch-up bookkeeping (if books are behind)
  • Payroll setup & management (optional add-on)
  • Inventory and sales tracking support
  • Monthly consultation call with Support Team

Or offer custom quote (Contact for tailored pricing).
